sub_title: Client Management l Graduate in Fashion & Business Development focusing in buying and supply chain production
summary:
3 short things about my professional personality, I'm:

_An electric, outgoing personality that believes that approaches projects comes with a willingness to dare and an empathy in team spirit.

_A sharp eye and passion for behavioural trends in textiles, garments and future technologies that balances creativity with feasibility.

_An open learner that takes challenges a learning opportunity to thrive.



I’m 29 years old from Malaysia and currently residing in the Netherlands. I initially began as a client manager in advertising and I've transitioned into fashion, starting with design and focusing on buying and production. I've made this through learning that :

-While I loved working with campaigns , I wanted to work with people in cultivating their brand and visual identity 

_I really enjoy analysing trends and implementing them into my projects. During this time, it was in marketing analysis for consumer interactivity and I felt that positioning myself closer to consumers is the next step forward.

_I am efficient in dealing with managing timelines of several ongoing projects and have been keen on precise communication, but I desire to work in an area that has management meet with creativity.

Through my education and work experience, I’ve learned that:

_I love the synergy between creativity and agility, considering market responses while maintaining a creative signature.

_I enjoy condensing trend potentials from various sources of media, occasions, and countries and cross-referencing them with data analytics.

_I believe that through buying, we get to know our demographic at heart—their interests and their potential growth in aesthetics—and that we can provide options to help them navigate themselves.

Over the course of my life, I’ve lived in:

Malaysia
Australia
Latvia
the Netherlands

Having lived and worked with such a significant difference in cultures, it really provides me a fluid lens on how people carry themselves visually and develop a skill in adaptively communicating a shared interest in fashion. Additionally, it strongly increases my visual vocabulary in garment styling and precision in detecting upcoming trends in fashion and marketing.

I desire to continue this journey of improvement professionally and provide a unique pair of lenses to finesse in your team. If you are interested after reading this, please reach out! I would love to forge a new connection with you.

Email: philiplingeuwinn@gmail.com
DM: https://www.linkedin.com/in/philiplingeuwinn/

profile_positions.description: Conducted interviews with educative coordinators as part of the diversity and inclusivity team. This was  to help co-ordinators in improving the accessibility of their course towards a more diverse generation that covers both cultural, mental and physical inclusivity.
profile_positions.title: Diversity and Inclusivity Interviewer

profile_positions.description: During my internship, I managed stock levels between retail shops and suppliers, ensuring that inventory was optimized and stockouts were minimized. Through this I gained valuable experience in the product development process, from trend research to observation in the final product development . This developed a strong understanding of inventory management, product development and market research with contribution to the brand.
profile_positions.title: Buying and Production Internship

profile_positions.location: Kuala Lumpur, Federal Territory of Kuala Lumpur, Malaysia
profile_positions.description:
My role was responsible for establishing efficient communication channels between vendors, designers, and clients to ensure seamless campaign execution. Precision in planning was crucial to ensure that the campaign was executed according to plan, and was entrusted with handling purchase orders to ensure minimal delays. 

Additionally, I was responsible for presentation decks management while working closely with the brand director to pitch new campaign ideas.Through this role, I developed strong communication, marketing and project management skills that I continue to leverage today.
profile_positions.title: Intern - Brand Catalyst

profile_positions.description:
Responsible for meeting high sales target regularly
Responsible for managing floor stock at end of day and regularly maintained presentable arrangement
Developed greater adaptability, quick decision making and conversational skills during high sales period
Precise in identifying customer demands through conversation
profile_positions.title: Retail Assistant
